scopes.company_external_api: Gives permission to call the external api
scopes.core_platform:read: Gives read permissions for the core platform endpoints
scopes.core_platform:write: Gives write permissions for the core platform endpoints
scopes.reward_system:read: Gives read permissions for the reward system endpoints

scopes.offline_access: Gives permission to retrieve a refresh token
